details:
noun
- the act of consuming something
= synonyms: using up, expenditure
- the process of taking food into the body through the mouth (as by eating)
= synonyms: intake, ingestion, uptake
- (economics) the utilization of economic goods to satisfy needs or in manufacturing
= example: (economics) the utilization of economic goods to satisfy needs or in manufacturing
= synonyms: use, usance, economic consumption, use of goods and services
- involving the lungs with progressive wasting of the body
= synonyms: white plague, pulmonary tuberculosis, phthisis, wasting disease
